text: Founded in 1955, the NATO Parliamentary AssemblyThe NATO Parliamentary Assembly was known as the North Atlantic Assembly until 1999. (NATO PA) is the consultative interparliamentary organization for the North Atlantic Treaty Organization. Its current President is Michal Szczerba from Poland. Szczerba succeeded JoÃ«lle Garriaud-Maylam of France in October 2023. ==References== Category:NATO
